text: The Pontifical Catholic University of Chile is a Catholic university based in the city of Santiago de Chile. It was founded in 1888 through a decree issued by the Santiago Archbishop. This university was one of the first Chilean universities teaching strong entrepreneurship starting with two subjects: law and mathematics. == Other websites == * Official Website Category:Colleges and universities in Santiago, Chile Category:1888 establishments in South America Category:19th-century establishments in Chile
title: Pontifical Catholic University of Chile
